mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Leib, Charles
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov F.H. Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Va. Sept 1st 1861. By Telegram from Clarksburg 1st 1861. the Ohio thirtieth have arrived Norton & myself have just returned with a company the rebels retreated will march Shintown [Shinnston] at seven (7) oclock to meet them Chas Leib Capt AQM 26 D83pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Leib, Charles
Clarksburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
